sentences.english: The cooperation with Tim started her seeking the new prospect of Er-Hu.
sentences.chinese: 和提姆的合作，让她开始寻思二胡的前景。

sentences.english: He figured if he could get by until midnight he would be okay.
sentences.chinese: 他寻思假若他能挨到半夜就没事了。

sentences.english: I pondered along the way about happiness and its sources. Where it comes from?
sentences.chinese: 一路上，我默默寻思着何为快乐，它从何处而来。

sentences.english: If I had any plan for the future at all, it was the thought that maybe I could join an army band.
sentences.chinese: 如果说我有未来计划的话，我寻思过加入军乐队。

sentences.english: Sometimes I think I will cut down such trees as remain in the wood.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，我寻思着把园里剩下的树全砍掉。

sentences.english: He was wondering if he could find some part-time job here.
sentences.chinese: 他寻思着能否在这儿找份零活。

sentences.english: The coxes were wondering last night whether she would get into any great family.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚，考克斯姐妹寻思着，她会不会去哪个上流人家。

sentences.english: These times give me the opportunity to search my heart and confront feelings I may have.
sentences.chinese: 这些时间让我有机会寻思内心，面对我可能有的情绪。

sentences.english: I hunted for a keypad to call her back, but it was gone.
sentences.chinese: 我寻思着用键盘给她打回去，可回拨号码不见了。

sentences.english: I stretched out like a stick be-tween the crisp sheets and pondered my good fortune.
sentences.chinese: 我在松软的被子里伸直手脚，寻思着我的好运。

sentences.english: I lay awake thinking and mind jumping around.
sentences.chinese: 我睡不着，只顾躺着寻思，心猿意马。

sentences.english: I contemplated whether or not Rewi Alley likewise intended to relieve his loneliness as he persisted in poetry translation.
sentences.chinese: 我寻思，他坚持译诗是否也意欲排遣孤寂落寞之感呢？

definition: to ponder/to reckon/to turn sth over in one's mind
to ponder/to mull over/to think through/Taiwan pr. [zhuo2 mo2]
to carve and polish (jade)/to polish and refine a literary work
to reckon/to consider/to turn over in one's mind
to consider/to turn over in one's mind
to speculate/to surmise/to wonder whether/to guess
to think to oneself/to think/to assume
to turn over in one's mind (idiom); to think through from different angles/to ponder
to think hard/bitter thoughts/to pour out one's sufferings
